system.description: Cost: 1 per person. A disciple of Morpheus, and up to 6 others can enter the Dreamworld through a sleeping mind. The Dreamworld is a strange world where the dreams of others are a reality. Great distances can be traveled in only a single night by taking a shortcut through the Dreamworld. Keep in mind the dream world isn't without danger, it's a strange ever-changing place where nightmares are real, and getting lost is easy.

attribution.source: Daria James LeFevre [Troika! Community Jam: Backgrounds 2024]
